long_description: Therm-a-Rest BaseCamp(TM) sleeping pad offers lighter, softer fabrics than previous seasons on both top and bottom of the pad, improving the softness and feel while reducing weight and bulk. Part of the Camp & Comfort(TM) series, this pad is created for campers whose greatest interest is sleeping comfort; perfect for car campers, family campers and base campers. Thick and warm 2 in. pad with expanded die-cut foam provides dependable insulation and cushioning from the cold, hard ground. Self-inflating pad has an R-Value of 5. The Therm-a-Rest BaseCamp sleeping pad includes a stuff sack.
short_description: Therm-a-Rest BaseCamp(TM) sleeping pad offers lighter, softer fabrics than previous seasons on both top and bottom of the pad, improving the softness and feel while reducing weight and bulk.
